name: Friday Music Battle Ultimate
description:
Plunge into the world of music and rhythm! The new application will delight fans of musical battles. Here you can take part in music competitions! Exciting tasks, interesting characters and unique musical compositions are waiting for you. Start the battle right now - download the app!

An exciting adventure is already waiting for you! You have to go through different levels and prove that you are the best rapper in the entire virtual world. At each of the levels you will have a special opponent. You need to quickly click on the moving arrows to get to the beat! Show all your dexterity and perform the track better than your opponent.

Premium Features:
- Access to different characters
- Unlocked all levels
- Exciting musical duels
- Unique tracks

A colorful interface, vivid characters and a variety of music tracks create a special atmosphere! You will definitely want to succumb to the beat of the music and dance with the main character!

Tell your friends about this app and invite them to play together! Find out which of you is the most agile and has the best sense of rhythm!

Important - you need subscription to use the app! There are no free functional inside!
* Upon confirmation of purchase of your subscription, payment will be charged to your iTunes account.
* Subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period and payment is charged to your iTunes account.
The renewal cost depends on your subscription plan. Our standard subscription plan - 1 week subscription is $5.99
For other currencies, the price matches the price level in the App Store Price Matrix.
* Subscription with a free trial period automatically renews to a paid subscription. You can cancel or manage the automatic renewal of the free trial by going to your Account Settings after purchase. Cancellation will take effect 24 hours after the last day of the current subscription period and you will be transferred to a free service.
* Please note: App doesn’t include free content. You need to subscribe to use it. Any unused portion of the three-day free trial period (if offered) will be forfeited when purchasing a premium subscription during the free trial period.
* For any other information, see our privacy policy and terms of use.
Privacy Policy: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1gDYumuaNuZqkhkiRYd2zwa4Wn96wMNNdca-zTPEIurE/edit?usp=sharing
Terms of Use: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1FoPHbcrn5wy_eL-0IZeXIqychZ7D1OVcQeNdkXsyk6A/edit?usp=sharing
